text: De l'adénopathie trachéo-bronchique en général et en particulier dans le scrofule et la phthisie pulmonaire précédée de l’étude topographique des ganglions trachéo-bronchiques by Alexandre Baréty, 1874. Alexandre Baréty (1844-1918) was a French physician. He was the author of many medical papers. With Henri Sappia, he co-founded the Acadèmia Nissarda, a historical society in Nice, in 1904. ==Works== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==References== Category:1844 births Category:1918 deaths Category:People from Nice Category:French physicians Category:French medical writers
title: Alexandre Baréty
